p: A total of 132 constituents have been identified in solvent extracts from different varieties of agarwood in the past 5 decades, and they belong to sesquiterpenes (52%), 2-(2-phenylethyl) chromone derivatives (41%), and aromatics (1%) [ 3]. In this study, we found that aromatics and sesquiterpenes were the two major chemical categories in the incense smoke of Kynam agarwood as analyzed with HS GC-MS. The difference may result from the extraction procedure or varieties of agarwood.
